resources.string: Name a card (other than a card that has a value of 1) and choose another player. If that player has that card, he or she is out of the round
You and another player secretly compare hands. The player with the lowest value is out of the round.
Until your next turn, ignore all effects from other players cards.
Choose any player (including yourself) to discard his or her hand and draw a new card.
Trade hands with another player of your choice.
If you have this card and either the cards with values of 6 or 5, you must discard this card.
If you discard this card, you are out of the round.
